entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Lawrence
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:51 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Lawrence 2:30 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -9.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 54 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -17.1°C
Wind: NW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16 except minus 21 north of Terrenceville.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16 except minus 21 north of Terrenceville. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 16 except minus 21 inland.
